long_description: The Kinetic Trainer mat is a simple accessory for any cyclist who cherishes a clean training environment. It keeps floors sweat-free and reduces vibrations from your bike trainer. Made from durable closed-cell PVC foam, it stands up to the most intense training sessions.
short_description: The Kinetic Trainer mat is a simple accessory for any cyclist who cherishes a clean training environment. It keeps floors sweat-free and reduces vibrations from your bike trainer.
